title: Developing Go-to-Market Strategy for Novel Electric Vehicle Components
description:
Description:

As a Business Development intern at Ergon, you will be involved in shaping the

go-to-market strategy for our patented fast-charging technology for Light EVs. This will

involve identifying the right vehicle manufacturers in target segments, pitching our

charging solution to them, generating opportunities for pilots and liaising between

potential customers and our engineering team.

In addition, you will also be responsible for marketing our solution and creating brand

awareness through our website social media accounts. This will include copywriting,

visual/graphic design, writing blog posts, coordinating with web developers etc.

Skill sets:

Oral and written communication, content creation, graphic design, secondary research,

member of Center for Entrepreneurial Leadership

Expected learning:

Through the course of this internship, you will gain hands-on experience with pitching a

novel hardware solution to vehicle manufacturers and understand what it takes to sell a

functional and safety critical product. You will hone your oral and written communication

skills by interacting with potential customers and creating advertising campaigns.

Moreover, you will be networking with various stakeholders, giving you a great headstart

for a career in the electric vehicle industry.

Specific courses required for project execution:

Mandatory:

? New Venture Creation

? Business Communication

? Mass Media Content and Design

Good-to-have

? Design Thinking for Innovation and Entrepreneurship

? Print & Audio-Visual Advertising

? Introduction to Mass Communication
